title: 谷歌访问助手安装
content:
# 谷歌访问助手安装 ### 第一步：下载 链接：https://pan.baidu.com/s/1Kl_E1erIjeGmxK0bkai9vg
提取码：dzyy
### 第二步：将下载的访问助手解压 ![解压后的文件](https://img-blog.csdnimg.cn/20190721211353423.png) ### 第三步：打开谷歌浏览器，点击右上角的自定义及控制 -> 更多工具 -> 扩展程序 进入到扩展程序页面 ![在这里插入图片描述](https://img-blog.csdnimg.cn/20190721211716260.png) ##### 1、扩展程序页面打开开发者模式 ![在这里插入图片描述](https://img-blog.csdnimg.cn/20190721211841948.png?x-oss-process=image/watermark,type_ZmFuZ3poZW5naGVpdGk,shadow_10,text_aHR0cHM6Ly9ibG9nLmNzZG4ubmV0L3FxXzQwMzA2MjY2,size_16,color_FFFFFF,t_70) ##### 2、 将crx文件拖入扩展程序： ![在这里插入图片描述](https://img-blog.csdnimg.cn/20190721212013512.png?x-oss-process=image/watermark,type_ZmFuZ3poZW5naGVpdGk,shadow_10,text_aHR0cHM6Ly9ibG9nLmNzZG4ubmV0L3FxXzQwMzA2MjY2,size_16,color_FFFFFF,t_70) ##### 3、拖入后会弹出提示框： ![在这里插入图片描述](https://img-blog.csdnimg.cn/20190721212131762.png?x-oss-process=image/watermark,type_ZmFuZ3poZW5naGVpdGk,shadow_10,text_aHR0cHM6Ly9ibG9nLmNzZG4ubmV0L3FxXzQwMzA2MjY2,size_16,color_FFFFFF,t_70) ##### 4、添加扩展程序后自动跳转激活页面： ![在这里插入图片描述](https://img-blog.csdnimg.cn/20190721212228325.png?x-oss-process=image/watermark,type_ZmFuZ3poZW5naGVpdGk,shadow_10,text_aHR0cHM6Ly9ibG9nLmNzZG4ubmV0L3FxXzQwMzA2MjY2,size_16,color_FFFFFF,t_70) ##### 5、点击激活后跳转到首页设置： ![在这里插入图片描述](https://img-blog.csdnimg.cn/20190721212329698.png?x-oss-process=image/watermark,type_ZmFuZ3poZW5naGVpdGk,shadow_10,text_aHR0cHM6Ly9ibG9nLmNzZG4ubmV0L3FxXzQwMzA2MjY2,size_16,color_FFFFFF,t_70) ##### 6、首页设置： ![在这里插入图片描述](https://img-blog.csdnimg.cn/20190721212546542.png?x-oss-process=image/watermark,type_ZmFuZ3poZW5naGVpdGk,shadow_10,text_aHR0cHM6Ly9ibG9nLmNzZG4ubmV0L3FxXzQwMzA2MjY2,size_16,color_FFFFFF,t_70) **勾选设置后，重新启动谷歌浏览器，会发现打开谷歌浏览器后右上角会有一个谷歌浏览其访问助手的标志，则为安装成功。** ![在这里插入图片描述](https://img-blog.csdnimg.cn/20190721213201407.png)

title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)
